title: BRENDA Enzyme Database - JSON download file
description:
Contents of the BRENDA json download file.
Download is avaliable at [www.brenda-enzymes.org](https://www.brenda-enzymes.org/download.php).

release.description: The BRENDA release number of the data.

version.description: The version number of the schema used.

data.description: All data entries for annotated enzymes.
